system@link.description: Link to the system receiving the commands

inputName.description: Name of the system control input receiving data from this control stream

procedure@link.description: Link to the procedure used to execute commands (only provided if all commands in the control stream share the same procedure)

deployment@link.description: Link to the deployment during which the commands are/were received (only provided if all commands in the control stream share the same deployment)

featureOfInterest@link.description: Link to the ultimate feature of interest (only provided if all commands in the control stream share the same feature of interest)

samplingFeature@link.description: Link to the sampling feature (only provided if all commands in the control stream share the same sampling feature)

controlledProperties.description: List of properties that are controllable through this control stream

issueTime.description: Time extent spanning all issue times of commands in this control stream

executionTime.description: Time extent spanning all execution times of commands in this control stream

live.description: Flag indicating if the command channel can currently accept commands

async.description: Flag indicating if the command channel processes commands asynchronously

schema.description: Schema describing the content of commands in this control stream. The exact syntax of the schema depends on the encoding format.
